creator: davidw@apache.org
text:
I'm having trouble building the most recent 1.3 release on moof.  I don't have
time to investigate further myself:-(

gcc -c  -I../../os/unix -I../../include   -DDARWIN -DUSE_HSREGEX -DUSE_EXPAT
-I../../lib/expat-lite `../../apaci` -DSHARED_MODULE mod_env.c && mv mod_env.o
mod_env.lo
cc  -bundle -undefined suppress -flat_namespace  -o mod_env.so mod_env.lo 
/usr/bin/ld: -undefined: unknown argument: -lbundle1.o
make[4]: *** [mod_env.so] Error 1
make[3]: *** [all] Error 1
make[2]: *** [subdirs] Error 1
make[1]: *** [build-std] Error 2
make: *** [build] Error 2
@moof [~/apache_1.3.34] $ uname -a
Darwin moof.apache.org 7.7.0 Darwin Kernel Version 7.7.0: Sun Nov  7 16:06:51
PST 2004; root:xnu/xnu-517.9.5.obj~1/RELEASE_PPC  Power Macintosh powerpc
